name: confyeti-api-users
description: API handler for users requests to the TV Me API

scripts.deploy: npm run clean & npm run predeploy & npm run zip & npm run publish
scripts.publish: aws2 --profile confyeti lambda update-function-code --function-name confyeti-api-users --zip-file fileb://confyeti-api-users.zip
scripts.zip: 7z a confyeti-api-users.zip index.js.tmp & 7z rn confyeti-api-users.zip index.js.tmp index.js

author: Mike Jancar
